mapper.select: SELECT WORK_SEQ_NO AS workSeqNo, CHANGE_CHASU AS changeChasu, STEXT_GUBUN AS stextGubun, WORK_GUBUN AS workGubun, NOTICE_DATETIME AS noticeDatetime, TASK_APPLY_DATE AS taskApplyDate, WORK_DATE AS workDate, INSTALL_TERMINAL_COUNT AS installTerminalCount, INSTALL_FAC_COUNT AS installFacCount, BRANCH_NAME AS branchName, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, BIZ_MANAGER_NAME AS bizManagerName, MANAGER_TELNO AS managerTelno, WORK_CONTENT AS workContent FROM ATMS_02001100

SELECT WORK_SEQ_NO AS workSeqNo, CHANGE_CHASU AS changeChasu, STEXT_GUBUN AS stextGubun, WORK_GUBUN AS workGubun, NOTICE_DATETIME AS noticeDatetime, TASK_APPLY_DATE AS taskApplyDate, WORK_DATE AS workDate, INSTALL_TERMINAL_COUNT AS installTerminalCount, INSTALL_FAC_COUNT AS installFacCount, BRANCH_NAME AS branchName, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, BIZ_MANAGER_NAME AS bizManagerName, MANAGER_TELNO AS managerTelno, WORK_CONTENT AS workContent FROM ATMS_02001100 WHERE WORK_SEQ_NO = #{workSeqNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE ATMS_02001100 SET CHANGE_CHASU = #{changeChasu}, STEXT_GUBUN = #{stextGubun}, WORK_GUBUN = #{workGubun}, NOTICE_DATETIME = #{noticeDatetime}, TASK_APPLY_DATE = #{taskApplyDate}, WORK_DATE = #{workDate}, INSTALL_TERMINAL_COUNT = #{installTerminalCount}, INSTALL_FAC_COUNT = #{installFacCount}, BRANCH_NAME = #{branchName}, CORNER_NAME = #{cornerName}, BIZ_MANAGER_NAME = #{bizManagerName}, MANAGER_TELNO = #{managerTelno}, WORK_CONTENT = #{workContent} WHERE WORK_SEQ_NO = #{workSeqNo}

INSERT INTO ATMS_02001100 ( WORK_SEQ_NO, CHANGE_CHASU, STEXT_GUBUN, WORK_GUBUN, NOTICE_DATETIME, TASK_APPLY_DATE, WORK_DATE, INSTALL_TERMINAL_COUNT, INSTALL_FAC_COUNT, BRANCH_NAME, CORNER_NAME, BIZ_MANAGER_NAME, MANAGER_TELNO, WORK_CONTENT ) VALUES ( #{workSeqNo}, #{changeChasu}, #{stextGubun}, #{workGubun}, #{noticeDatetime}, #{taskApplyDate}, #{workDate}, #{installTerminalCount}, #{installFacCount}, #{branchName}, #{cornerName}, #{bizManagerName}, #{managerTelno}, #{workContent} )
